title: Krauthamer on emancipation among NA - context

content.question: Which of the following represents the most direct limitation of the extent to which the Civil War affected the practice of slavery in the United States?

choices.label: At the end of the Civil War, there were still more African Americans living in the South than in the North.
At the end of the Civil War, the economy of the South continued to be based on cash crop agriculture.
At the end of the Civil War, most former Confederate politicians and military officers were still allowed to hold political office.
At the end of the Civil War, slavery was still legal in some parts of the United States.

content.answer: At the end of the Civil War, slavery was still legal in some parts of the United States.
